faqs.question: what is frontend development ?
faqs.answer: Front-end development is the process of designing and building the graphical user interface (GUI) of a website or app, including the parts that users interact with.

faqs.question: what is Java ?
faqs.answer: Java is a well-known, general-purpose, object-oriented programming language that's used to create applications for many different types of devices and platforms

faqs.question: what is JavaScript and its features ?
faqs.answer: JavaScript (JS) is a programming language that developers use to make web pages more interactive. It's a client-side scripting language that's considered a core technology of the World Wide Web.

faqs.question: what is polymorphism in java
faqs.answer: Polymorphism in Java is a core concept of object-oriented programming (OOP) that allows objects of different classes to be treated as objects of a common superclass or interface. It means many forms and refers to the ability of an object to take on multiple forms.
